name: Epic Zuuker
description: Born to be wild... a Wild Bagpipe! The Epic Zuuker draws air in through the various spiracles found all over its body, just as the Wubbox drew inspiration from the musical life-form that flourishes in high-altitude environment. It's basically a living instrument... but then, aren't all Singing Monsters living instruments, if you really think about it?
polarity: Negative from: Epic Screemu, Negative toward: Epic Thwok, Positive from: Epic Maulch, Positive toward: Epic Bona-Petite
